title: Governor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-You have an additional secret vote you can place at anybody.
-Reveal yourself as the Governor.
-Shoot someone at night. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You cannot shoot until you reveal yourself as the Governor.
-Once you reveal, you cannot have an addiitional vote anymore
-Shooting someone deals a Basic Attack.
-If you die, the next day, Town can lynch 2 people. This does not happen if you shot a town member.

desc:
Post 347
*The Town will win under my rule.*
